page.title: 20A CONSTRUCTION MANAGERS DAY
page.content: My dad is called Ian Currie.He is 38 years old and he works for{Derek {Crouch}construction LTD.Derek Crouch is a building company.My dads part is a construction manager.He gets up every morning at 6.45 and gets washed.Then he has his breakfast and at about 7.30 he goes to work.He has to travel very far everyday.He is in charge of all the other sites where houses are being built.All the sites are in the North East of England.The main office is in Birtley Co.Durham.He drives a{Ford Granada}which is owned by the firm.He usually gets back home about 6.30pm.When he gets home he sometimes has to make a lot of phone calls about his work.I think that my dads job is very interesting but hard work. {BY STEPHEN CURRIE.
